name: @mirantis/lens-extension-cc
description: Lens extension that loads Mirantis Container Cloud clusters.

scripts.test: yarn lint && yarn fmt:check && yarn test:unit
scripts.prepack: yarn build && yarn download:kubelogin:all && yarn download:kubelogin:license
scripts.download:kubelogin:all: yarn download:kubelogin:macos && yarn download:kubelogin:linux && yarn download:kubelogin:windows
scripts.download:kubelogin:macos: yarn create:bin:nix && yarn download:kubelogin:macos-amd64 && yarn download:kubelogin:macos-arm64
scripts.download:kubelogin:macos-amd64: [[ -f ./bin/kubelogin-macos-amd64 ]] || (mkdir -p ./tmp && cd ./tmp && curl -slL https://github.com/int128/kubelogin/releases/download/v1.25.1/kubelogin_darwin_amd64.zip | tar -xz && mv kubelogin ../bin/kubelogin-macos-amd64 && chmod +x ../bin/kubelogin-macos-amd64 && cd .. && rm -rf ./tmp)
scripts.download:kubelogin:macos-arm64: [[ -f ./bin/kubelogin-macos-arm64 ]] || (mkdir -p ./tmp && cd ./tmp && curl -slL https://github.com/int128/kubelogin/releases/download/v1.25.1/kubelogin_darwin_arm64.zip | tar -xz && mv kubelogin ../bin/kubelogin-macos-arm64 && chmod +x ../bin/kubelogin-macos-arm64 && cd .. && rm -rf ./tmp)
scripts.download:kubelogin:linux: yarn create:bin:nix && ([[ -f ./bin/kubelogin-linux-amd64 ]] || (mkdir -p ./tmp && cd ./tmp && curl -slL https://github.com/int128/kubelogin/releases/download/v1.25.1/kubelogin_linux_amd64.zip | tar -xz && mv kubelogin ../bin/kubelogin-linux-amd64 && chmod +x ../bin/kubelogin-linux-amd64 && cd .. && rm -rf ./tmp))
scripts.download:kubelogin:windows: yarn create:bin:windows && sh -c "[[ -f ./bin/kubelogin-win-amd64.exe ]] || (mkdir -p ./tmp && cd ./tmp && curl -slL https://github.com/int128/kubelogin/releases/download/v1.25.1/kubelogin_windows_amd64.zip | tar -xz && mv kubelogin.exe ../bin/kubelogin-win-amd64.exe && chmod +x ../bin/kubelogin-win-amd64.exe && cd .. && rm -rf ./tmp)"
